replies.author: ImmortalRabbit

replies.bodyText:
this issue is related to travis itself (as far as i can judge now). it can be they are hitting some rate limiting or a similar issue:

https://travis-ci.community/t/continuous-maven-repo-403/3908/37
travis-ci/travis-ci#10053 (comment)
https://issues.sonatype.org/browse/MVNCENTRAL-4985

@rnveach @romani @strkkk - can you please rerun the failed jobs and clear the caches. it seems maven have whitelisted new travis ip addresses nearly a week ago (unless they got new addresses in the meantime again).
